casebody.data: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Squire PADGETT, Jr. No. D-2992. Supreme Court of the United States June 19, 2017. Squire Padgett, Jr., of Alexandria, Virginia, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
